definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

pinyin: wai4 guo2 ren2 ju1 zhu4 zheng4 ming2

sentences.english: How to improve as the World Habitat Weihai city's cultural taste and grade?
sentences.chinese: 如何提高威海做爲世界人居城市的文化品位和檔次？

sentences.english: The description of inhabiting environment and architecture is very romantic and various.
sentences.chinese: “楚辭”中對人居環境與建築的描寫宏富浪漫多彩。

sentences.english: In both languages, the name means "fishing islands, " but these days the rocky, uninhabited islands are better known for discord.
sentences.chinese: 但這些天來，這個無人居住的石頭島以紛爭聞名世界。

sentences.english: They were attracted by the weather and the low crime rate.
sentences.chinese: 他們覺得這裏的天氣適宜人居，城市的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: The environment suitable for living of South Hunan traditional residence has embodies deeply traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 湘南傳統人居的宜居環境深深地滲透着中國傳統文化。

sentences.english: The human environment of Guangdong has occupied the earth-shaking change since the Reform and Open Policy.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放以來廣東人居環境發生了翻天覆地的變化。

sentences.english: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of beast shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.
sentences.chinese: 人的腳，獸的蹄都不經過，四十年之久並無人居住。

sentences.english: It puts forward that human settlements system in metropolis fringe is a speci.
sentences.chinese: 從系統角度分析大城市邊緣區人居環境的結構與功能。

sentences.english: The debris will mostly likely fall into an ocean or land in an uninhabited region of Earth.
sentences.chinese: 碎片很可能將落到海洋中或無人居住的地區。

sentences.english: Finland has been a long-term supporter of UN-Habitat.
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭長期以來一貫支持聯合國人居署。

sentences.english: There are way too many new buildings with nobody living in them in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國有太多的無人居住的新樓盤。

sentences.english: After breaking out of jail, he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 他越獄後躲藏在一個無人居住的農舍裏。

sentences.english: Today, safety of the natural resources of this island is provided by the absence of population.
sentences.chinese: 現在，該島自然資源的安全由無人居住來保證。

sentences.english: Yangpu old GM was the Ministry of Construction of China Habitat Environment Prize sample.
sentences.chinese: 楊浦舊區改造獲得了建設部中國人居環境範例獎。

sentences.english: In 2008, Nanjing was awarded the special honor of UN Habitat Scroll of Honor Special Citation.
sentences.chinese: 2008年，南京榮獲聯合國人居最佳特別榮譽獎。
